# base_call

The `BaseCall` class for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/base_call/index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/base_call/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/base_call/index" symbolName="BaseCall" /> BaseCall

A base class for generating responses using LLMs.
